title: Cycleworx Langebaan
overview: Your local bicycle shop, providing you with first-class services and products. This project was probably one of my most influential projects. Even though the project is small in size, it's big on impact.

outline.goal: Having a small online footprint, I was tasked to increase online awareness that reflects its true value.
outline.scope: The business needed a landing page customers can find and locate, emphasising on SEO metrics.
outline.industry: The bicycle industry, fast-growing and full of potential. An industry I've worked in myself.

challenges.title: Clear Intent
content: The website users needed a clear understanding of what the website represents and what services are offered. Explaining most of what is offered by the shop and giving them a clear indication of what the business does.

challenges.title: Telling a Story
content: One of the strong suits of the business is the story it has to tell. I gave the website a more personal feel by including the website's journey and the faces that represent it.

conclusion: By converting the website from a website builder to a custom Gatsby landing page, we were able to boost SEO results within a week. Searching for a bicycle shop yielded the website on the first page of the search results.
The business is still gaining traction in the digital space and has great reviews on Google. I had an absolute blast creating the website and increasing its online presence.
